rounds.title: Number of Rounds
rounds.description: rounds per game (each player throws 3 darts per round)

rules.title: Cricket {mode} Rules
common: Close each target by hitting it 3 times
Single = 1 mark, Double = 2 marks, Triple = 3 marks

standard.title: Standard Mode:
rules: Score points for YOURSELF on your closed targets
Winner: Close all targets AND have the MOST points

cutThroat.title: Cut Throat Mode:
rules: Give points to OPPONENTS on your closed targets
Winner: Close all targets AND have the LEAST points

errors.minPlayers: You need at least 2 players to start!

legend.title: Legend
legend.mprDesc: Average number of marks per round. A good player reaches 3+ MPR.
legend.standardDesc: Close your numbers (3 marks) then score points by continuing to hit those numbers. The player with the most points wins!
legend.cutThroatDesc: Points (shown in red) are BAD! When you hit a number you've closed but your opponents haven't, you give them points. Close your targets quickly to avoid receiving points. The player with the LEAST points wins!

legend.objectiveDesc: Subtract your points from the starting score to reach exactly 0

split.title: Split Bull
split.description: 25 points for 25 zone, 50 points for Bull zone

unified.title: Unified Bull
unified.description: Both 25 and Bull zones give 50 points per hit

targetScore.title: Target Score
targetScore.description: Points to win (0 = win by rounds)
targetScore.note: If a target score is set, the game ends when a player reaches or exceeds it.

rules.title: Target Bull Rules
common: Goal: Score maximum points using only sector 25 and bull sector
Each player throws 3 darts per round
Only hits on 25 (single bull) and 50 (double bull) award points
All other sections (1-20, miss) count as 0 points

scoring.title: Scoring System:
rules: 25 points for hitting sector 25 (if 'Split Bull' mode)
50 points for hitting sector 25 (if 'Unified Bull' mode)
50 points for hitting Bull zone (single bull)

errors.minPlayers: You need at least 2 players to start!
errors.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to Granboard. Make sure it's powered on and try again.

legend.title: Legend & Rules
legend.objectiveDesc: Score maximum points by hitting only sector 25 and bull sector. The player with the highest total points after the specified number of rounds or upon reaching the target score wins.
legend.scoringSplitDesc: 25 points for sector 25, 50 points for Bull zone (single bull). Double Bull always 50 points.
legend.scoringUnifiedDesc: 50 points for both zones (25 and Bull). Double Bull also 50 points.
legend.otherSections: Hits on any other sections (1-20) award no points.
legend.ppdDesc: Average points scored per dart (Total points scored ÷ Number of darts thrown).
legend.pprDesc: Average points scored per round (Total points scored ÷ Number of rounds played).
legend.accuracyDesc: Percentage of valid target hits (25 or Bull) out of total darts thrown.
legend.winConditionsDesc: The game can end in two ways: 1) If a number of rounds is set – after they are completed, the player with the highest total points wins. 2) If a target score is set – the first player to reach or exceed it wins.
